---
title: "**edibble**: An R-package to construct designs using the grammar of experimental designs"
author: "Emi Tanaka"
image: https://github.com/emitanaka/edibble/raw/master/man/figures/logo.png
---


You can install this package from [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/edibble/index.html):

```r 
install.packages("edibble")
```

And the development version on [GitHub](https://github.com/emitanaka/edibble):

```r
remotes::install_github("emitanaka/edibble")
```
